title: Game crashes right as I go into game
body:
I don't know if this is a hardware issue or a game issue but please help.
As soon as everyone has hit 100% and the game puts me in, my whole laptop makes this "wrrring" sound and completely freezes. 
Then, I have to manually shut it off with the power button. When I do try to reconnect to the game, it freezes as soon as I go in. 
Does anybody know of this issue or how to fix it?

replies.body: There may be an issue with your drivers or game files that's causing the game to render improperly, and  crash.  Check out our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for some steps to get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
What do you think may be the issue? And what solution in your opinion would be the best to try out first?
It's hard to say to be honest.  The computer making weird noises is concerning, so it's not clear to me.  I would start with updating drivers, then go from the top of the list.
It's working now! I think I had to update my graphics card. I also did repair corrupt files so I don't know which did it. But thank you!
I'm getting that too. Did you get that huge update for windows?
Yeah I did, it may be that now that I think about it. Have you fixed it?

Yeah another kid came up with a solution. Right click the league icon, go to properties, click  compatibility, then go down to "Run this program in compatibility for" and then click windows 7. i went into a custom game and it worked out!
Oh! I didn't do that, I had to update graphic card drivers for me. But I'm glad you found a way to fix it!

Im getting that as well, I even uninstalled the update and reinstalled League and its still crashes every time I get in game. I have no idea how to fix it. I now have a 10 minute timer to get into game because Ive been trying to fix this stuff.
FIxed it! I'm pretty sure you have to update your graphics card drivers
I'm glad I'm not the only one. I have too unistalled it and retryed. but it still does it.
